timeline.message:
Hoist repeated string calls into locals

On JDK11.0.7, i5 16G RAM:
- Delete units.cache
- Load 4MB CPNX
- Units Before: 7870 ms
- Units After: 3296 ms

timeline.bodyText: We should probably move this into a constant
timeline.author: Windchild292

replies.bodyText: Noted, just wanted this PR to be 'to-the-point' so as to make the review simple.
replies.author: sixlettervariables
